name: Shaken, Not Purred
title: Diona: Shaken, Not Purred
desc: Shake and stir till its all evenly mixed... and there! Your refill's ready!

source: Reward for inviting Diona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1102], equip this card.
After $[A1102] equips this card, immediately use $[S11022] once.
When your $[A1102], who has this card equipped, creates a Cat-Claw Shield, its Shield points +1.
(You must have $[A1102] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
